title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 3.98 - Executive Order No. 98: Designating the Department of Health as the State agency responsible for statistical activities under the Cooperative Health Statistics Plan System
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 3.98 - Executive Order No. 98: Designating the Department of Health as the State agency responsible for statistical activities under the Cooperative Health Statistics Plan System

State Regulations
WHEREAS, The acquisition, storage, retrieval, analysis and
dissemination of health-related statistics have an important bearing on the
public health; and
WHEREAS, The New York State Department of Health, through
its Offices of Public Health and Health Systems Management, is now engaged in
and developing programs which use health-related statistics; and
WHEREAS, Recent Federal legislation establishing the

Cooperative Health Statistics System requires that each State designate a State
agency to administer or be responsible for the statistical activities under the
system; and
WHEREAS, The New York State Department of Health now
participates under Federal contract in the Cooperative Health Statistics

System; NOW, THEREFORE, I, Hugh L. Carey, Governor of the State of

New York, by virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and Laws
of the State of New York, do hereby designate the New York State Department of

Health as the sole State agency responsible for administering health-related
statistical activities within the State under the Cooperative Health Statistics

System. Signed: Hugh L. Carey

Dated: February 21, 1980

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
3.98

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
